title: v1.6.3.5-v10 Documentation Update
details:
Updated Copilot instructions and agent files for v1.6.3.5-v10. Key documentation changes:

1. **Callback Wiring Fix** - Documented `setHandlers()` pattern and `_buildCallbackOptions()` in UICoordinator
2. **Z-Index Fix** - Documented `_applyZIndexAfterAppend()` method in window.js
3. **Cross-Tab Scoping** - Documented `getCurrentTabIdFromBackground()` function
4. **Storage Corruption Prevention** - Documented `forceEmpty` parameter in storage-utils.js
5. **Diagnostic Logging** - Documented `_broadcastQuickTabsClearedToTabs()` in background.js

Files Updated:
- .github/copilot-instructions.md (11KB)
- .github/agents/quicktabs-unified-agent.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-cross-tab-agent.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-single-tab-agent.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-manager-agent.md
- .github/agents/bug-fixer.md
- .github/agents/bug-architect.md
- .github/agents/feature-builder.md
- .github/agents/copilot-docs-updater.md

All files verified under 15KB limit.
